body.left_template:
Schengen Tourist (“C”-Type) visa application form, original Form must be duly filled in English or Italian, and signed by the applicant (if the applicant is a minor, the form must be signed by both parents or its legal guardian)

 

Two recent and identical photos. Photos must be ICAO format (4.0 x 3.5 cm, color photo with white background, taken within the last 6 months)

Valid Passport, original + 1 copy of pages 2 and 3 only (i.e the pages containing only the passport data and personal data) Passport must be valid for at least 3 months after planned departure date from 

Schengen area. The passport must have at least two blank and unmarked visa pages. 

 

If visiting family or friends residing Invitation letter in the format that can be downloaded in the respective section of VFS Web page , proof of family/ties with the inviting person, copy of ID of inviting person and copy of residence permit if foreigner

 

If working: Employment letter , in original Letter from the employer in English on official company paper with stamp, signature and date, introducing the business person and clearly mentioning: address, telephone and fax numbers of the employing company; the name and position in the employing company of the countersigning officer; the name of the applicant, position, salary and years of service; approval for leave; confirmation of position after return 

 

In case the applicant is a self-employed: Trade licence issued by City Corporation and Incorporation Certificate issued by Office of Registrar of Joint Stock Company Income tax return TIN Certificate Company bank statement of the last 6 months

 

In case the applicant is a student: Proof of enrolment in educational establishment in Bangladesh Certificate of leave absence if travelling during school year. The certificate should mention full address, telephone number, permission of absence, name and function of the person granting permission If school trip: letter of the school mentioning the purpose, duration and destination of the trip

 

Proof of financial means of the applicant Personal bank statement issued by any bank operating in Bangladesh covering the last 6 months complemented by any other proof of financial solvency (credit card statements etc.). If the applicants does not have sufficient own financial means a bank fidejussion (Fidejussione Bancaria) issued by an Italian bank is necessary

 

Return airline ticket booking with Passenger Registration Number or Reservation Number and travel itinerary

 

Hotel Confirmation or any other documents proving accommodation for the whole period of stay in the Schengen member States

 

Travel Insurance Insurance must be valid for the whole Schengen area. The insurance must cover medical fees, hospitalization and repatriation costs up to 30,000 Euros. The insurance must fully cover the whole period of stay within the Schengen area. 

 

Documents related to civil status of the applicant For married applicants: marriage certificate (e.g.“Nika Namah” for muslims or marriage act for hindus, both translated in English) For divorced applicants: divorce certificate (e.g. “Talak Namah” for muslims in English) For widowers and widows: death certificate of the spouse in English

 

In case of minors applying for visa Consent of both parents or custodian if both parents are not travelling together Photocopy of passport of parents or legal guardian Proof of financial means of parents or legal guardian (see point 6) Original birth certificate of the minor issued by the relevant authority The status of “legal guardian” must be proven by documents issued by the relevant Bangladeshi Courts for minors 

 

For Non-Bangladeshi applicants: Further than all documents listed on the present check-list, Bangladeshi Residence Permit valid at least 3 months beyond the intended date of departure from the territory of the Member States

The Consulate of the Republic of Singapore in Dhaka processes visa applications for Bangladeshi Nationals and other foreigners who require a social visa to enter Singapore. Visitors holding ordinary Bangladeshi passports will need to apply for an entry visa prior to their arrival in Singapore. Holders of Bangladeshi Diplomatic and Official passports are exempted from visa requirements.

body.left_template:
General Documents for Business Visa:

  1. Passport or travel document with validity not less than 6 months and 5 days from the time of application and minimum two blank pages for visa stamp.
  2. Copy of previous passports and visas issued.
    Attach all your old passports (if any).
  3. 2 sets of photocopy bio-data page of the applicant’s passport (including address page).
  4. Singapore Visa Application Form:
    2 sets of Visa Application Form-14A completely filled in with original sign as per passport. Click Here
  5. Two recent passport size photographs with matt or semi matt finish, white background and without border (Size: 35mm x 45mm)
    Please Note: Photograph should not be more than 3 months old, scanned/stapled and should not be used in any of the previous visas.
  6. Covering Letter from applicant name, designation, Passport Number, purpose and outlining who will be responsible for the full costs of the trip – travel, accommodation, expenses, etc. Addressed to – The Visa Officer, Embassy of Singapore, Dhaka.
  7. Visa request letter from the company if employed or travel letter from the educational institute/student card /
  8. Visiting Card (1 Original & 1 photocopy).
  9. Letter of Introduction (LOI) to be issued by a local contact in Singapore:
    All the information mentioned in the passport and NID must be the same. In case of dissimilarity, affidavit is mandatory.
  10. Bank Solvency Certificate and Original Bank statement.
  11. For Business Visitors, a Singapore registered company/organization can act as a local contact. The LOI must be signed by a Singapore Citizen or Singapore Permanent Resident, who is at least 21 years old, only.

Return airline ticket booking with Passenger Registration Number or Reservation Number and travel itinerary

 

Hotel Confirmation or any other documents proving accommodation for the whole period of stay in the Schengen member States

 

Travel Insurance Insurance must be valid for the whole Schengen area. The insurance must cover medical fees, hospitalization and repatriation costs up to 30,000 Euros. The insurance must fully cover the whole period of stay within the Schengen area. 

 

Documents related to civil status of the applicant For married applicants: marriage certificate (e.g.“Nika Namah” for muslims or marriage act for hindus, both translated in English) For divorced applicants: divorce certificate (e.g. “Talak Namah” for muslims in English) For widowers and widows: death certificate of the spouse in English

 

In case of minors applying for visa Consent of both parents or custodian if both parents are not travelling together Photocopy of passport of parents or legal guardian Proof of financial means of parents or legal guardian (see point 6) Original birth certificate of the minor issued by the relevant authority The status of “legal guardian” must be proven by documents issued by the relevant Bangladeshi Courts for minors

If visiting family or friends residing Invitation letter in the format that can be downloaded in the respective section of VFS Web page , proof of family/ties with the inviting person, copy of ID of inviting person and copy of residence permit if foreigner

 

If working: Employment letter , in original Letter from the employer in English on official company paper with stamp, signature and date, introducing the business person and clearly mentioning: address, telephone and fax numbers of the employing company; the name and position in the employing company of the countersigning officer; the name of the applicant, position, salary and years of service; approval for leave; confirmation of position after return 

 

In case the applicant is a self-employed: Trade licence issued by City Corporation and Incorporation Certificate issued by Office of Registrar of Joint Stock Company Income tax return TIN Certificate Company bank statement of the last 6 months

 

In case the applicant is a student: Proof of enrolment in educational establishment in Bangladesh Certificate of leave absence if travelling during school year. The certificate should mention full address, telephone number, permission of absence, name and function of the person granting permission If school trip: letter of the school mentioning the purpose, duration and destination of the trip

 

Proof of financial means of the applicant Personal bank statement issued by any bank operating in Bangladesh covering the last 6 months complemented by any other proof of financial solvency (credit card statements etc.). If the applicants does not have sufficient own financial means a bank fidejussion (Fidejussione Bancaria) issued by an Italian bank is necessary

 

Return airline ticket booking with Passenger Registration Number or Reservation Number and travel itinerary

 

Hotel Confirmation or any other documents proving accommodation for the whole period of stay in the Schengen member States

 

Travel Insurance Insurance must be valid for the whole Schengen area. The insurance must cover medical fees, hospitalization and repatriation costs up to 30,000 Euros. The insurance must fully cover the whole period of stay within the Schengen area. 

 

Documents related to civil status of the applicant For married applicants: marriage certificate (e.g.“Nika Namah” for muslims or marriage act for hindus, both translated in English) For divorced applicants: divorce certificate (e.g. “Talak Namah” for muslims in English) For widowers and widows: death certificate of the spouse in English

 

In case of minors applying for visa Consent of both parents or custodian if both parents are not travelling together Photocopy of passport of parents or legal guardian Proof of financial means of parents or legal guardian (see point 6) Original birth certificate of the minor issued by the relevant authority The status of “legal guardian” must be proven by documents issued by the relevant Bangladeshi Courts for minors 

 

For Non-Bangladeshi applicants: Further than all documents listed on the present check-list, Bangladeshi Residence Permit valid at least 3 months beyond the intended date of departure from the territory of the Member States 



For Business Visa Additional Documents

A covering letter stating the purpose of visit and itinerary.

Invitation from the inviting company or organization stating the purpose of the journey (meetings, conferences, training or business related events).

Forwarding Letter / NOC from the applicant’s company authority on the company’s letter head stating applicant’s name, designation, passport number, purpose and duration of visit.

Visa request letter from the educational institute or student card/evidence of school enrollment (if student)

Company registration certificate (original notarized English translated and photocopy of the original) if the applicant is a first-time traveler or a proprietor.

Office ID card copy & Visiting cards.

General Documents:

  1. Two copies 35/45 size Recent photo (Mate Paper and background must be white).

  4. Bank solvency certificate with Bank seal and signature. (validity only 20 Days)
  5. Visiting Card.

  1. Leave letter in official pad (For job holder)
  2. Last Three Months Pay Slip
  3. Official ID card photocopy (For job holder)
  4. Update Trade license photocopy With Notary (For Business person)
  5. Company Memorandum for Business person (If Applicable)
  6. Official Pad for visa Request letter (For Business person)

Family Documents:

  1. Birth Certificate
  2. School ID Card Photocopy
  3. NOC from School (Minimum 2 Contact Number Need)
  4. Marriage Certificate (If Applicable)

body.left_template:
Business Visa Requirements : 

  1. A passport with six months of validity on the date of application should have at least 2 empty pages.
  2. Passport biodata page photocopies (3 copies)
  3. 3 copies of Biometric photos with a white background that were taken within the last 6 months covering the full face including ears and all hair, clearly and completely visible without shadow, in size 2x2, met paper
  4. Marriage certificate & Nikkah Nama attested by a Notary Public (If a married couple is traveling together)
  5. National ID card or birth certificate photocopy (ID mandatory)
  6. Travel insurance (Must be done here, from outside is not allowed. Only UN & Government Insurance will be allowed)
  7. Airline ticket reservation
  8. Hotel reservation
  9. Original bank statement up to date (Covers the transactions of the last three months)
  10. Original bank solvency
  11. Letter of introduction from the company (If the visit will be made on behalf of a company)
  12. Letter of invitation from an individual or institution in Turkey (Properly signed and directly sent by e-mail or fax to the Embassy)
  13. Trade license attested by Notary Public, Import-Export License, LC (If exist)
  14. Income tax return / TIN attested by Notary Public
  15. Membership to any trade body attested by a Notary Public

  3. Full Name, Address, contact number & email address of USA
  4. Father Date of Birth & Birthplace
  5. Mother Date of Birth & Birthplace
  6. Education Background last one, like MBA or Masters (Institution Name, Major Subject & Passing Year)
  7. Current Residential Address
  8. Job Staring Date (Current Job)
  9. Previous Job (Mentioned Start & Closing Date, Designation,
  10. Company Name, Supervisor name & Contact Number)
  11. Current Monthly Salary after Tax
  12. Applicant Mobile Number (Official & Personal) & Home Phone Number
  13. Current email address & previous email address if any
  14. Facebook Name

U.S. Embassy in Dhaka, Bangladesh
Madani Avenue, Baridhara,
Dhaka -1212, Bangladesh
Phone: (+88) 02 885 5500
Fax: (+88) 02 882 3744
Website: www.dhaka.usembassy.gov/
Office Hours: Sunday to Thursday (08:00 AM – 16:30 PM) except holidays.

 

The Embassy’s Consular Section provides a wide variety of visa services to Bangladeshi and other foreign nationals here in Bangladesh.

Non-Immigrant Visas: Processes applications for temporary visas to the United States including tourist visas, business visas, student visas, and temporary work permits.

 

 Non-Immigrant visa categories and qualifications: Most applicants for non-immigrant visas travel to the United States for tourism, business, study, or temporary work.
body.right_template_two:
Visa Fee depends on the Embassy
Visa Processing Service Charge = 5000 BDT
Visa processing takes approximately 21 workdays from the date on which the application is received by the Embassy.

body.left_template:
Documents for Business Visa

  1. Original Passport with validity of minimum six months after the intended date of departure and minimum two blank pages for visa stamp.
  2. Copy of previous passports and visas issued.
  3. Attach all your old passports (if any).
  4. If any visa request was refused, details of original letter issued by the authorities of that country would be preferred.
  5. Visa application form must be filled and signed by the applicant.
  6. Two recent passport size photographs with matt or semi matt finish, 60-80% face coverage, white background and without border (Size: 35mm x 45mm) Photograph should not be more than 3 months old, scanned/stapled and should not be used in any of the previous visas.
  7. Covering Letter from applicant name, designation, Passport Number, purpose and outlining who will be responsible for the full costs of the trip – travel, accommodation, expenses etc. Addressed to – The Visa Officer, Embassy of United States, Dhaka.
  8. Invitation Letter (If Any)
  9. Forwarding Letter / NOC from the applicant’s company authority on the company’s letter head stating applicant’s name, designation, passport number, purpose and duration of visit.
  10. Visa request letter from the educational institute or student card/evidence of school enrollment (if student)
  11. Company registration certificate (original notarized English translated and photocopy of the original) if the applicant is a first time traveler or a proprietor.
  12. Office ID card copy & Visiting cards.
  13. Company’s or Personal Bank Statement for last six months mentioning the Bank’s name, Bank’s Telephone Number clearly.
  14. Salary slip for the last six months. (If Any)
  15. Ticket Itinerary & Hotel Booking.

body.left_template:
Required Papers for Business Visa

  1. Invitation for a Business visa, Sticker/Port
  2. Immigration Clearance for Sticker visa/Port
  3. Two copies 2/2 size recent photos (Glossy Paper and background must be white).
  4. Passport validity minimum 6 months 7 days, previous all passport (If any).
  5. Bank statement for the last six months with Bank seal and signature. (Closing balance minimum 70,000/- per person) (Personal)
  6. Bank solvency certificate with bank seal & signature (Personal)
  7. Bank statement for the last six months with Bank seal and signature (Company)
  8. Bank solvency certificate with bank seal & signature (Company)
  9. Trade license photocopy with notary
  10. Visa Request Letter (Print Normal Paper)
  11. Forwarding letter (Print Company Pad)
  12. TIN Certificate (Company)
  13. TIN Certificate (Personal if any)
  14. Salary Certificate
  15. Leave letter in official pad
  16. Visiting Card
  17. Official ID card copy
  18. Invitation Letter of Vietnam office
  19. Trade license copy of Vietnam office
  20. Registration /TIN certificate copy of Vietnam office
body.right_template_one:
Applicants seeking Vietnam visas can submit their Short/Long term visa applications, supporting documents and at Vietnam Embassy.

Embassy of Vietnam in Dhaka, Bangladesh
Address: Vintage Building, Plot 07,
Road 104, Gulshan-2,
Dhaka 1212, Bangladesh
Phone: (880-2)-8854052
Fax: (880-2)-8854051

Email: dhaka@mofa.gov.vn
Office hours: Monday-Friday 8:30 a.m. to 5:30 p.m
Visa submission: 09:00 am – 11:30 am
Visa collection: 15:00 pm – 16:00 pm
Website: www.vietnamembassy-bangladesh.org/
body.right_template_two:
Visa & Processing Fee = 9000 BDT Express (5-7 Working days)

Issued Time: 7 to 10 working days. We can also urgent that depends on time and immigration issues.

body.left_template:
Required Papers for Tourist Visa

  1. Immigration Clearance for Sticker visa/Port
  2. Two copies 2/2 size recent photo (Glossy Paper and background must be white).
  3. Passport validity minimum 6 months 7 days, previous all passport (If any).
  4. Bank statement for last six months with Bank seal and signature. (Closing balance minimum 70,000/- per person) (Personal)
  5. Bank solvency certificate with bank seal & signature (Personal)
  6. Bank statement for the last six months with Bank seal and signature (Company)
  7. Bank solvency certificate with bank seal & signature (Company)
  8. Trade license photocopy with notary
  9. Visa Request Letter (Print Normal Paper)
  10. Forwarding letter (Print Company Pad)
  11. TIN Certificate (Company)
  12. TIN Certificate (Personal if any)
  13. Salary Certificate
  14. Leave letter in official pad (if job holder)
  15. Visiting Card
  16. Official ID card copy

Additional Info

  1. Hotel booking
  2. Return air ticket
  3. Tour itinerary (According to demand)
  4. Photo (PP)
  5. Visiting card (If)
  6. Previous visa copy (if)

 

Cost for Approval Letter of Immigration Invitation as below:

  1.  120 USD for one month
  2.  115 USD for three (3) weeks
  3.  110 USD for 2 weeks
  4.  95 USD for one week

 

Exchange rate = (Market rate+ 2) BDT
